standard_metadata.standard_description: Apply and extend previous understandings of multiplication and division and of fractions to multiply and divide rational numbers.

hints.content: $\begin{array}{rr} &\phantom{0.00}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)\blue{7}\phantom{.00}}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $4$ go into $\blue{7}$?
$\begin{array}{rr} &1.\phantom{00}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)7.0\phantom{0}}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{4}\phantom{.00}\\ &3\phantom{.00} \end{array}$  Write a decimal point and a $0$ in the tenths place.

$\begin{array}{rr} &1.\phantom{00}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)7.0\phantom{0}}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{4}\phantom{.}{\downarrow}\phantom{0}\\ &\blue{3\phantom{.}0}\phantom{0} \end{array}$  How many times does $4$ go into $\blue{30}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &1.7\phantom{0}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)7.00}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{4}\phantom{.00}\\ &3\phantom{.}0\phantom{0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{2\phantom{.}8}\phantom{0}\\ &\phantom{0.}2\phantom{0} \end{array}$  Write a $0$ in the hundredths place.

$\begin{array}{rr} &1.7\phantom{0}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)7.00}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{4}\phantom{.0}{\downarrow}\\ &3\phantom{.}0{\downarrow}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{2\phantom{.}8}{\downarrow}\\ &\phantom{0.}\blue{20} \end{array}$  How many times does $4$ go into $\blue{20}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &1.75&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)7.00}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{4}\phantom{.00}\\ &3\phantom{.}0\phantom{0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{2\phantom{.}8}\phantom{0}\\ &\phantom{0.}20\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{\phantom{0.}20}\\ &0 \end{array}$  The remainder is $0$, so we have our answer.
$\begin{array}{rr} &\phantom{0.0}&\\ {5}&\overline{\Big)\blue{9}4\phantom{.0}}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $5$ go into $\blue{9}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &1\phantom{0.0}&\\ {5}&\overline{\Big)94\phantom{.0}}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{5}{\downarrow}\phantom{.0}\\ &\blue{44}\phantom{.0}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $5$ go into $\blue{44}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &18.\phantom{0}&\\ {5}&\overline{\Big)94.0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{5}\phantom{0.0}\\ &44\phantom{.0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{40}\phantom{.0}\\ &4\phantom{.0} \end{array}$  Write a decimal point and a $0$ in the tenths place.

$\begin{array}{rr} &18.\phantom{0}&\\ {5}&\overline{\Big)94.0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{5}\phantom{.0}{\downarrow}\\ &44\phantom{.}{\downarrow}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{40}\phantom{.}{\downarrow}\\ &\blue{4\phantom{.}0} \end{array}$  How many times does $5$ go into $\blue{40}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &18.8&\\ {5}&\overline{\Big)94.0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{5}\phantom{.00}\\ &44\phantom{.0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{40}\phantom{.0}\\ &4\phantom{.}0\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{4\phantom{.}0}\\ &0 \end{array}$  The remainder is $0$, so we have our answer.
$\begin{array}{rr} &\phantom{0.00}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)\blue{1}9\phantom{.00}}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $4$ go into $\blue{1}$?
$\begin{array}{rr} &0\phantom{0.00}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)\blue{19}\phantom{.00}}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $4$ go into $\blue{19}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &04.\phantom{00}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)19.0\phantom{0}}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{16}\phantom{.00}\\ &3\phantom{.00}\\ \end{array}$  Write a decimal point and a $0$ in the tenths place.

$\begin{array}{rr} &04.\phantom{0}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)19.0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{16}\phantom{.}{\downarrow}\\ &\blue{3\phantom{.}0}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $4$ go into $\blue{30}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &04.7\phantom{0}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)19.00}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{16}\phantom{.00}\\ &3\phantom{.}0\phantom{0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{2\phantom{.}8}\phantom{0}\\ &2\phantom{0} \end{array}$  Write a $0$ in the hundredths place.

$\begin{array}{rr} &04.7\phantom{0}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)19.00}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{16}\phantom{.0}{\downarrow}\\ &3\phantom{.}0{\downarrow}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{2\phantom{.}8}{\downarrow}\\ &\blue{20} \end{array}$  How many times does $4$ go into $\blue{20}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &4.75&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)19.00}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{16}\phantom{.00}\\ &3\phantom{.}0\phantom{0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{2\phantom{.}8}\phantom{0}\\ &20\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{\phantom{0.}20}\\ &0 \end{array}$  The remainder is $0$, so we have our answer.
$\begin{array}{rr} &\phantom{0.0}&\\ {10}&\overline{\Big)\blue{1}3\phantom{.0}}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $10$ go into $\blue{1}$?
$\begin{array}{rr} &0\phantom{0.0}&\\ {10}&\overline{\Big)\blue{13}\phantom{.0}}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $10$ go into $\blue{13}$?
$\begin{array}{rr} &01.\phantom{0}&\\ {10}&\overline{\Big)13.0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{10}\phantom{.0}\\ &3\phantom{.0}\\ \end{array}$  Write a decimal point and a $0$ in the tenths place.

$\begin{array}{rr} &01.\phantom{0}&\\ {10}&\overline{\Big)13.0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{10}\phantom{.}{\downarrow}\\ &\blue{3\phantom{.}0}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $10$ go into $\blue{30}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &1.3&\\ {10}&\overline{\Big)13.0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{10}\phantom{.0}\\ &3\phantom{.}0\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{3\phantom{.}0}\\ &0 \end{array}$  The remainder is $0$, so we have our answer.
$\begin{array}{rr} &\phantom{0.00}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)\blue{1}5\phantom{.00}}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $4$ go into $\blue{1}$?
$\begin{array}{rr} &0\phantom{0.00}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)\blue{15}\phantom{.00}}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $4$ go into $\blue{15}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &03.\phantom{00}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)15.0\phantom{0}}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{12}\phantom{.00}\\ &3\phantom{.00}\\ \end{array}$  Write a decimal point and a $0$ in the tenths place.

$\begin{array}{rr} &03.\phantom{00}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)15.0\phantom{0}}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{12}\phantom{.}{\downarrow}\phantom{0}\\ &\blue{3\phantom{.}0\phantom{0}}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $4$ go into $\blue{30}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &03.7\phantom{0}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)15.00}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{12}\phantom{.00}\\ &3\phantom{.}0\phantom{0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{2\phantom{.}8}\phantom{0}\\ &2\phantom{0} \end{array}$  Write a $0$ in the hundredths place.

$\begin{array}{rr} &03.7\phantom{0}&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)15.00}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{12}\phantom{.0}{\downarrow}\\ &3\phantom{.}0{\downarrow}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{2\phantom{.}8}{\downarrow}\\ &\phantom{0.}\blue{20} \end{array}$  How many times does $4$ go into $\blue{20}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &3.75&\\ {4}&\overline{\Big)15.00}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{12}\phantom{.00}\\ &3\phantom{.}0\phantom{0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{2\phantom{.}8}\phantom{0}\\ &20\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{20}\\ &0 \end{array}$  The remainder is $0$, so we have our answer.
$\begin{array}{rr} &\phantom{0.00}&\\ {25}&\overline{\Big)\blue{1}1\phantom{.00}}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $25$ go into $\blue{1}$?
$\begin{array}{rr} &0\phantom{0.00}&\\ {25}&\overline{\Big)\blue{11}\phantom{.00}}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $25$ go into $\blue{11}$?
$\begin{array}{rr} &00.\phantom{00}&\\ {25}&\overline{\Big)11.0\phantom{0}}\\ \end{array}$  Write a decimal point and a $0$ in the tenths place.
$\begin{array}{rr} &00.\phantom{00}&\\ {25}&\overline{\Big)\blue{11}.\blue{0}\phantom{0}}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $25$ go into $\blue{110}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &00.4\phantom{0}&\\ {25}&\overline{\Big)11.00}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{10\phantom{.}0}\phantom{0}\\ &\pink{1\phantom{.}0\phantom{0}} \end{array}$  Write a $0$ in the hundredths place.

$\begin{array}{rr} &00.4\phantom{0}&\\ {25}&\overline{\Big)11.00}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{10\phantom{.}0}{\downarrow}\\ &\blue{1\phantom{.}00} \end{array}$  How many times does $25$ go into $\blue{100}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &0.44&\\ {25}&\overline{\Big)11.00}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{10\phantom{.}0}\phantom{0}\\ &1\phantom{.}00\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{1\phantom{.}00}\\ &0 \end{array}$  The remainder is $0$, so we have our answer.
$\begin{array}{rr} &\phantom{0.0}&\\ {5}&\overline{\Big)\blue{5}7\phantom{.0}}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $5$ go into $\blue{5}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &1\phantom{0.0}&\\ {5}&\overline{\Big)57\phantom{.0}}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{5}{\downarrow}\phantom{.0}\\ &0\blue{7}\phantom{.0}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $5$ go into $\blue{7}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &11.\phantom{0}&\\ {5}&\overline{\Big)57.0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{5}\phantom{0.0}\\ &07\phantom{.0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{5}\phantom{.0}\\ &2\phantom{.0} \end{array}$  Write a decimal point and a $0$ in the tenths place.

$\begin{array}{rr} &11.\phantom{0}&\\ {5}&\overline{\Big)57.0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{5}\phantom{.0}{\downarrow}\\ &07\phantom{.}{\downarrow}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{5}\phantom{.}{\downarrow}\\ &\blue{2\phantom{.}0} \end{array}$  How many times does $5$ go into $\blue{20}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &11.4&\\ {5}&\overline{\Big)57.0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{5}\phantom{.00}\\ &07\phantom{.0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{5}\phantom{.0}\\ &2\phantom{.}0\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{2\phantom{.}0}\\ &0 \end{array}$  The remainder is $0$, so we have our answer.
$\begin{array}{rr} &\phantom{0.00}&\\ {25}&\overline{\Big)\blue{3}3\phantom{.00}}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $25$ go into $\blue{3}$?
$\begin{array}{rr} &0\phantom{0.00}&\\ {25}&\overline{\Big)\blue{33}\phantom{.00}}\\ \end{array}$  How many times does $25$ go into $\blue{33}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &01.\phantom{00}&\\ {25}&\overline{\Big)33.0\phantom{0}}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{25}\phantom{.00}\\ &8\phantom{.00} \end{array}$  Write a decimal point and a $0$ in the tenths place.

$\begin{array}{rr} &01.\phantom{00}&\\ {25}&\overline{\Big)33.0\phantom0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{25}\phantom{.}{\downarrow}\phantom{0}\\ &\blue{8\phantom{.}0\phantom{0}} \end{array}$  How many times does $25$ go into $\blue{80}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &01.3\phantom{0}&\\ {25}&\overline{\Big)33.00}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{25}\phantom{.00}\\ &8\phantom{.}0\phantom{0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{7\phantom{.}5}\phantom{0}\\ &5\phantom{0} \end{array}$  Write a $0$ in the hundredths place.

$\begin{array}{rr} &01.3\phantom0&\\ {25}&\overline{\Big)33.00}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{25}\phantom{.0}{\downarrow}\\ &8\phantom{.}0{\downarrow}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{7\phantom{.}5}{\downarrow}\\ &\blue{50} \end{array}$  How many times does $25$ go into $\blue{50}$?

$\begin{array}{rr} &01.32&\\ {25}&\overline{\Big)33.00}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{25}\phantom{.00}\\ &8\phantom{.}0\phantom{0}\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{7\phantom{.}5}\phantom{0}\\ &50\\ &\mathllap{-}\underline{50}\\ &0 \end{array}$  The remainder is $0$, so we have our answer.
Notice how the decimal is repeating and will continue to repeat as we bring down more zeros.
